p: Influenza cases peaked initially from January 8 to 21, followed by another peak from February 5 to March 4 ( Figure 1). This was different from the Northern China epidemic profile (one peak, January 1â€“21). During the two peaks, there was a total of 1776 influenza positive cases. Among these, influenza B accounted for 1579 cases, with only 203 as influenza A positive. These include six cases testing as both influenza A and B positive.
